title: Educational Psychology 6th ed 2018 by John Santrock
description: COVER: http://i.imgur.com/G3ncc0k.jpg TITLE: Educational Psychology, 6th edition (2018) AUTHOR: John W. Santrock ISBN-13: 9781260152760 BOOK SPECS: https://www.mheducation.com/highered/product/9781260152760.html FILE SPECS: true PDF, logical page numbers as in the print version, bookmarks, 40 MB DESCRIPTION: Santrock’s "Educational Psychology" emphasizes the application of theory to real classroom practice. With richly evocative classroom vignettes from practicing teachers and a wealth of case studies, "Educational Psychology" helps students think critically about the research basis for best practices. Santrock’s hallmark Learning System organizes the content into manageable chunks under learning goals, supporting retention and mastery, so that students will have an engaging and successful course experience. BRIEF CONTENTS: --------------- 1 Educational Psychology: A Tool for Effective Teaching 2 Cognitive and Language Development 3 Social Contexts and Socioemotional Development 4 Individual Variations 5 Sociocultural Diversity 6 Learners Who Are Exceptional 7 Behavioral and Social Cognitive Approaches 8 The Information-Processing Approach 9 Complex Cognitive Processes 10 Social Constructivist Approaches 11 Learning and Cognition in the Content Areas 12 Planning, Instruction, and Technology 13 Motivation, Teaching, and Learning 14 Managing the Classroom 15 Standardized Tests and Teaching 16 Classroom Assessment and Grading glossary answers references indexes

parsed.dn: Educational Psychology 6th ed 2018 by John Santrock
